data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Epirus and Western Macedonia to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary: On average, 29 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, let the threatened of Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,764 believers in Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,764 believers in the state of Epirus and Western Macedonia with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.section_summary:
the state of Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece has a population of 353,800.

We estimate Epirus and Western Macedonia has 1,764 people who might know Jesus, 312,608 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 39,428 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 200 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Epirus and Western Macedonia, Greece to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
